payload.name: pcie-host-device-transfers-are-expensive
payload.title: PCIe host↔device transfers are expensive: treat boundaries as quota’d interfaces
payload.formal: crossing bus boundaries costs latency and bandwidth; avoid chatty transfers.
payload.apm2_mapping: “boundary” = **tool call**. Every tool call crosses a trust boundary and should carry explicit budgets, schemas, and receipts. APM2 does this with protobuf tool requests, validation, policy evaluation, and budget consumption accounting. Don’t bypass that boundary “for convenience.”
